definition: unable to change sth/unable to deal with
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: He therefore entered, without ceremony, and groped his way to the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他于是顾不得礼节，径自入门，摸索着去厨房的路。

sentences.english: In order to finish the interview manuscript, he didn't even have time for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 他为了赶写访谈稿，连中饭都顾不得吃。

sentences.english: He gave much to Socrates suddenly lift into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他顾不得许多，猛地把苏格拉底掀下水。

definition: in a great rush/in a flurry
there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
to be just about to/to be on the point of
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: not saying anything further (idiom); not raising any objection/without demur
